ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/CICE-Consortium/Icepack
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Development repository for sea-ice column physics

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/GEOS-ESM/MAPL
ns0:entry.ns0:content: MAPL is a foundation layer of the GEOS architecture, whose original purpose is to supplement the Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/OpenFAST/openfast
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Main repository for the NREL-supported OpenFAST whole-turbine and FAST.Farm wind farm simulation codes.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/cp2k/cp2k
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/earth-system-radiation/rte-rrtmgp
ns0:entry.ns0:content: RTE+RRTMGP is a set of codes for computing radiative fluxes in planetary atmospheres.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/ecmwf/fckit
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A Fortran toolkit for interoperating Fortran with C/C++

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/esmf-org/esmf
ns0:entry.ns0:content: The Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) is a suite of software tools for developing high-performance, multi-component Earth science modeling applications.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/geoschem/geos-chem
ns0:entry.ns0:content: GEOS-Chem "Science Codebase" repository. Contains GEOS-Chem science routines, run directory generation scripts, and interface code. This repository is used as a submodule within the GCClassic and GCHP wrappers, as well as in other modeling contexts (external ESMs).

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/wrf-model/WRF
ns0:entry.ns0:content: The official repository for the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model
